content: 5 / 10 12 5 cm from the picked up stitches shape crown row 1 k10 k2tog to the end of the round 110 121 st row 2 and all alternate row knit row 3 k9 k2tog to the end of the round 100 110 st row 5 k8 k2tog to the end of the round 90 99 st row 7 k7 k2tog to the end of the round 80 88 st row 9 k6 k2tog to the end of the round 70 77 st row 11 k5 k2tog to the end of the round 60 66 st row 13 k4 k2tog to the end of the round 50 55 st row 15 k3 k2tog to the end of the round 40 44 st row 17 k2 k2tog to the end of the round 30 33 st row 19 k1 k2tog to the end of the round 20 22 st row 21 k2tog to end of round 10 11 st break yarn thread through a darning needle and pass through the remaining loops pulling hard before securing weave in ends block lightly taking care not to open up the lace band too much © janet stimson 2020
